description.en: A failed idol was confronted with the crisis of needing to quit her group, but instead exchanged bodies with a failed witch who crossed over to her world. One is the novice witch who wants to conquer the world, and the other is the novice idol who wants to return to a center position idol. How can two girls with opposite personalities mature and embark on a new adventure in another world?

altTitles.ja: 銃夢 Last Order

altTitles.vi: Thiên thần chiến binh: Mệnh lệnh cuối cùng

description.en:
Master mangaka Yukito Kishiro returns, accompanied by his most celebrated character, cyborg sweetheart Battle Angel Alita. Meet Kishiro's latest bevy of bizarre and tormented characters and catch up with your favorite and foes!

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/battle-angel-alita-last-order-omnibus/)
description.vi:
Tiếp nối câu chuyện về hành trình tìm lại ký ức của Alita

Thay đổi hướng đi của những trang cuối từ phần đầu, bộ truyện bắt đầu ngay sau khi Alita bị tiến sĩ Nova dội bom.

Đối đầu với một Tiraphes giờ đây đã hoang tàn, Alita quyết đi lên thành phố vũ trụ Ketheres để giành lại Lou cùng với Nova và các bản sao của mình.

title.en: Granblue Fantasy: Bonds of the Twin Swords

altTitles.ja: グランブルーファンタジー　双剣の絆

description.en:
There was once a land by the name of Feendrache that was blessed by a primal beast. Upon the arrival of Gran and his companions Lyria and Vyrn, the kingdom becomes entwined in turmoil. With the aid of the Dragon Knights, they rush to save it from those who intend to plunge it into darkness.

An adaptation of the first two events/side stories in the "Dragon Knights" series from the mobile RPG *Granblue Fantasy*, Defender's Oath and Four Knights of a Fallen Land.

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.ja: マキナさんのママならない日々

altTitles.en: Makina's Days of Not Being a Mom

description.en:
I am a babysitting android named MAK-17.
My plentiful interactions with babies have helped me develop something like a "heart".
No matter how many times I'm sold to a recycling shop, meeting new babies brings light into my life.
Now, I wonder what kind of baby I'll meet next?
N-...no matter how I look at him... he's an "adult", right...?

altTitles.th: เลเวลอัปไปกับเทพเจ้า

altTitles.ja: 神と共にレベルアップ

description.en:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhObyLPUq6w)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%A0%EA%B3%BC-%ED%95%A8%EA%BB%98-%EB%A0%88%EB%B2%A8%EC%97%85/2708)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2/215)
description.ja:
異界の神、アウターゴッドと呼ばれる存在が支配する世界。一番最後に塔へ入り一番最後までインナーゴッドたちと共に戦った人間、神野 流星。 そんな彼も結局はアウターゴッドに破れてしまう。 越えられない壁に絶望を感じていた最後の瞬間、時間を司る神であるクロノスから新たにチャンスが与えられる。 そうして彼は、前世の記憶を持ったまま過去へ回帰することに――。 再び塔を登り、力と仲間を手に入れた神野は、今度こそアウターゴッドに勝つことができるだろうか？不滅の神話に挑む人間の物語が今始まる！

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhObyLPUq6w)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%A0%EA%B3%BC-%ED%95%A8%EA%BB%98-%EB%A0%88%EB%B2%A8%EC%97%85/2708)

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/12982/)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/82357)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%84%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%9E%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2/215)
description.ko:
이계의 신, 아우터 갓(Outer God).

하늘을 닫는 절망과 늪에 빠진 좌절, 탄생하지 못한 자, 어리석은 혼돈.
평범한 사람들은 그저 바라보는 것만으로 목숨을 잃어 버릴 그 존재들이 세상을 휘젓는 지금…
수 년간의 싸움 끝에, 최후의 생존자들이 낸 결론.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다."

그 순간, 시간을 다루는 신격을 지닌 존재 크로노스는 자신을 희생시켜 시계태엽을 되돌린다.

"이길 수 없겠지. 지금은 말이야."

"옛 세계선으로 돌아가라. 그리고 다시 시작해."

모든 신들에게 지목을 받아 과거로 돌아간 최후의 1인.
가장 뒤늦게 탑을 올라, 가장 마지막까지 신들과 함께 싸운 인간, 김유원.

"이너(Inner)는 아우터(Outer)를 이길 수 없다. 그렇다면…"

"이기는 건 나야."

그는 마지막 순간을 함께하던 동료들을 다시 모아,
아우터와의 싸움을 승리로 끝낼 수 있을까?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xhObyLPUq6w)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%A0%EA%B3%BC-%ED%95%A8%EA%BB%98-%EB%A0%88%EB%B2%A8%EC%97%85/2708)

description.ru:
Он был храбрейшим и сильнейшим из всех, но даже его в самом конце ожидало лишь отчаяние. В последние мгновения ему был дан еще один шанс. Благодаря жертве бога времени «Хроноса» его судьба еще не была предрешена. Вернувшись в прошлое, он снова попытается взобраться на «Башню» со своим непревзойденным талантом, чтобы побороть древнее зло, которое грозит уничтожить этот мир.

---

description.th:
"อินเนอร์อย่างพวกเราไม่สามารถเอาชนะเอาเตอร์ได้"

เมื่อแรงเกอร์ในหอคอยลงความเห็นเป็นเสียงเดียวกัน
'คิมยูวอน' มนุษย์ผู้แกร่งกล้าเพียงหนึ่งเดียวในหมู่เทพเจ้า
จึงถูกเลือกให้ย้อนกลับมายังอดีตเพื่อเริ่มต้นทุกอย่างใหม่อีกครั้ง

เขาจะสามารถทำตามแผนที่ทุกคนช่วยกันวางไว้
และแกร่งขึ้นกว่าเดิมจนกลับไปเอาชนะ 'เอาเตอร์ก็อด'
ทวยเทพที่ลุกล้ำเข้ามาจากนอกหอคอยได้หรือไม่?

---

description.zh:
外界之神来袭，人间陷入了排山倒海般的绝望之中，生灵涂炭……而当内界众神在经过了数年的苦苦战斗后，也最终以战败收场。 在战死前的最后时刻，希腊神克洛诺斯牺牲了自己，重新开启了时间之门。 而众神最后选择了金幽元，这个队伍中唯一的人类，让他回到过去，重新将众神凝聚。

---

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.

altTitles.ja: サタノファニ
Satanofani

description.en: A mysterious syndrome turns schoolgirls into homicidal monsters behind numerous atrocities in Japan. However, nothing is what it seems and when Chika Amagi is arrested for the brutal murder of five people, a journey into uncharted, troubled waters begins!
description.es: Un misterioso síndrome convierte a las colegialas en monstruos homicidas detrás de numerosas atrocidades en Japón. Sin embargo, nada es lo que parece y cuando Chika Amagi es arrestado por el brutal asesinato de cinco personas, ¡comienza un viaje a aguas desconocidas y turbulentas!
description.fr:
Au Japon, un mystérieux syndrome transforme les écolières d'un établissement en monstres sanguinaires, capables de tuer leurs semblables avec un sang-froid incroyable. Dans cette période de trouble, Chika Amagi, étudiante sans histoire, est arrêtée pour le meurtre terrible de cinq personnes…   


---
description.ja: 活発で食いしん坊な、普通の女の子だったはずの彼女は、ある事件をきっかけに「羽黒刑務所」へと導かれる。島に建てられたその刑務所には、メデューサ症候群と呼ばれる殺人少女たちだけが集められているのであった。彼女たちに宿る凶悪とは――!?
description.pt-br: Uma síndrome misteriosa torna jovens garotas em monstros homicidas por trás de diversas atrocidades no Japão. Entretanto, nada é o que parece quando Chika Amagai é presa pelo assassinato brutal de cinco pessoas e é levada a uma prisão em uma ilha para estas assassinas!

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

altTitles.ja: 血の姫と騎士

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)

title.en: Shingeki no Eroko-san ~Hen na Oneesan wa Danshikousei to Nakayoku Naritai~

altTitles.ja: 進撃のえろ子さん
進撃のえろ子さん～変なお姉さんは男子高生と仲良くなりたい～

altTitles.ru: Атака на Эроко ~Взрослая сестренка, которая хочет стать ближе со старшеклассником~

description.en:
Shindou Eruko, a glasses, big breasted beauty, found a job as a handyman for the Amaguri Handyman service after her NEET life comes to an end as her savings ran out. She immediately falls for her co-worker Hoshi-kun on their first day working together, but there's a problem: Hoshi-kun is a high school boy, while Eruko is a 27 years old onee-san who has trouble telling reality and delusions apart. She ends up constantly scheming to get close to Hoshi-kun to turn many of her delusions into reality, but after several near-misses, it became apparent to Eruko that Hoshi-kun does, indeed, have feelings toward her.
  
This manga takes place after Vol.14 in  [Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko](https://mangadex.org/title/15331/henjyo-the-strange-female-high-schooler-amaguri-senko)
description.pt: Shindou Eruko, uma grande beldade de seios grandes, encontrou um emprego de ajudante na empresa. Amaguri faz tudo, depois que a sua vida de NEET teve que acabar graças as suas economias. Ela imediatamente se apaixona por seu colega de trabalho, no qual se chama Hoshi, um garoto do ensino médi, enquanto a Eruko é uma mulher de 27 anos que tem problemas para diferenciar a ilusão de realidade. Ela acaba constantemente planejando se aproximar de Hoshi para transformar muitas de suas ilusões em realidade…
description.ru: Когда сбережения закончились, красотке в очках по имени Эруко пришлось прервать затворнический образ жизни и найти работу. Так она устроилась сотрудницей в сервис «Разнорабочие Амагури». В первый день работы Эруко влюбляется в коллегу Хоси, вот только есть проблема: Хоси — школьник, а Эруко — 27-летняя девушка, у которой проблемы с восприятием реальности. Эруко постоянно измышляет способы сблизиться с Хоси, чтобы воплотить свои фантазии в реальность.
description.pt-br: Shindou Eruko, uma grande beldade de seios grandes, encontrou um emprego de ajudante na empresa. Amaguri faz tudo, depois que a sua vida de NEET teve que acabar graças as suas economias. Ela imediatamente se apaixona por seu colega de trabalho, no qual se chama Hoshi, um garoto do ensino médi, enquanto a Eruko é uma mulher de 27 anos que tem problemas para diferenciar a ilusão de realidade. Ela acaba constantemente planejando se aproximar de Hoshi para transformar muitas de suas ilusões em realidade...

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム フラナガン・ブーン戦記

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gandamu Furanagan Boon Senki

description.en:
A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone, a Zeon soldier, trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi, but then, the Gundam, the "White Devil of the Federation," appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone, who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean
" (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!

altTitles.ja: 天才魔女の魔力枯れ

altTitles.pt-br: A Bruxa gênia perdeu seu MP

altTitles.vi: Nàng Phù Thủy Thiên Tài Hết Mana Rồi!

description.en: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
description.ja: 1mmでも図に乗った事がある元天才の君へ1万年に1人の天才魔女“ナユ”の魔力が枯れた！？天才ゆえに許されてきたあれやこれのツケが、今ブーメランのように突き刺さっていく…そんなナユが助けを求めたのは、自分のことが大好きな教え子の小麦くん。だいぶ痛いけどなんだか放って置けない奇妙な2人の共同生活が始まった！
description.vi: Nayu, đại phù thủy thiên tài vĩ đại đã hết mana và phải nương nhờ nhà main, một học sinh cũ của cổ...TÌNH CỜ thay main lại thích vị đài phù thủy thiên tài vĩ đại ấy và không lỡ làm ngơ cô ấy cho dù cô ấy rất ngỗ ngược...
description.pt-br: Nayu, aquela em um milhão de bruxas geniais que tem sido o assunto da cidade, ficou sem magia! O preço por todas as coisas que ela foi autorizada a fazer por causa de seu brilhantismo está voltando para a ex-bruxa genial como um bumerangue... Então, ela lembrou de seu ex-aluno "Komugi", que a ama muito. Esta é uma comédia de amor de retribuição cármica por uma ex-bruxa genial que não pode ser deixada sozinha, mesmo que doa um pouco, abandonada por seus poderes mágicos!

altTitles.ja: パンをナメるな！

description.en: No education, no work experience, no friends. Muyu Uchiki is a nineteen-year-old girl who's been a shut-in for two years, she lives a self-indulgent life, but a turning point comes for her?! She gets a call from her aunt in Kamakura about helping out at her bakery.
description.ja:
引きこもり少女がパン屋の店長に！？

学歴・職歴・友達無しの少女 内木夢夢(うちきむゆ)は、2年間 家に引きこもって自堕落な生活を送っていた…しかし、そんな彼女に転機が訪れる――！！鎌倉に住む叔母からパン屋のお手伝いに呼ばれたのだ！ワケも分からないまま鎌倉に着いたむゆに待ち受けていたのはパン屋の店長代理としてお店で働くことで…！？

description.en:
Short manga posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter. 

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

altTitles.ja: 毒を喰らわば皿まで

description.en: The Kingdom of Parsemis is a land blessed by an ancient dragon. In this kingdom, the evil Prime Minister Andrim remembers his past life while his daughter's marriage engagement to the crown prince is being broken. At the same time, he realizes that this world is that of an otome game that he was playing in his past life. In the game, his daughter is the evil fiancée of the crown prince and he is destined to be executed alongside her. Unable to accept this, Andrim devises a plan to trap the game's conquest targets, who side with the crown prince. He will stop at nothing for revenge including seducing his own rival...

description.fr: Un homme qui souffre d'insomnie depuis deux mois dérange accidentellement un serpent en hibernation. Le serpent veut manger l'homme et se prépare à le manger car la viande devient délicieuse après que toutes ces larmes versées. Que fera le serpent de ce festin ?

Quand un ange est mis au défi de séduire un démon, celui-ci se voit vite être mis en déroute par plus puissant que lui...Venez à la rencontre de Métatron et de Mammon, et découvrez leur histoire infernale...

altTitles.ja: 鬼さんの所へ参りました

description.en:
English:  
A girl was given to an oni as a sacrifice, however, he had merely asked for a servant. Since the oni in question is against child labour and she has no place to go, he decides to make her his temporary "wife" in name. So the young girl and the cheerful oni begin their warm (married?) life together.
description.pt: Ogro-san disse aos aldeões que precisava de uma emprega e os aldeões enviaram até ele uma pequena garota como "sacrifício". Vendo o mal-entedido que tinha se formado, ele diz a garota para voltar pra casa, mas ela o diz que não tem para onde voltar, então ele a oferece uma chance de ficar com ele sendo sua "esposa temporária".

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

title.en: Help! I Had Transmigrated and My Snake Husband Pampered Me Too Much

altTitles.zh: Jiù Mìng! Chuān Yuè Shòu Shì Shé Fū Chāo Chǒng Wǒ!
救命！穿越兽世蛇夫超宠我！

altTitles.zh-ro: Jiu Ming! Chuan Yue Shou Shi She Fu Chao Chong Wo!

description.en:
Lu Ling transmigrated into the Beast World novel that he had just read halfway through before going to bed, and became a cannon fodder, deer beast.

The current plot is that after Lu Linggang agreed to Snake Ying's "courtship" request, he would use his fiancé Snake Ying to get the winter resources.

After Lu Ling transmigrated, she couldn't bear Snake Shadow to experience the plot of being "betrayed by herself" and "ruthlessly abandoned" again.

Although Snake Shadow's departure may lead to her failure in the future, Lu Ling still decided to "break off the marriage", but she was helpless every time.

What will happen to Lu Ling?
description.fr:
Lu Ling s'est fait transmigré dans le monde d'un livre alors qu'elle était en train de le lire avant d'aller se coucher et après cela elle devenu une biche !

Elle est arrivé au moment de l'histoire où Lu Ling a accepté de devenir la partenaire de She Ying pour récupéré ses ressources pour l'hiver.

Après avoir transmigré Lu Ling n'a pas supporté de faire subir ça a She Ying et donc elle assez de s'éloigner de lui.
Meme si le fait de quitter She Ying, pourrait mener à sa fin, Lu Ling a quand même décidé de se séparer de lui...

Que va t-il se passé et arrivé a Lu Ling dans ce nouveau monde ? Va t-elle rester avec She Ying ? Comment va t-elle vivre dans ce nouveau monde ?
description.zh: 鹿灵穿越到自己睡前刚看了一半的兽世小说中，成了一只炮灰鹿兽女配。目前的剧情正是鹿灵刚答应蛇影的“求偶”请求后，马上要利用未婚夫蛇影过冬的剧情。鹿灵穿越后，不忍蛇影再次经历被“自己背叛”和“无情抛弃”的剧情，虽然蛇影的离开可能会导致自己过冬失败，但鹿灵还是决定要“退婚”，无奈每次都被打断。

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 斩灵少女：我契约的全是上古神兵

altTitles.en: Soul-Slaying Girl: All the contracts I contracted are ancient divine weapons.

description.en: Han Zhan traveled through time and space, where the girls could transform into magic weapons and fight under contract. The boy would awaken and become a spiritual contract master, and make a contract with them to resist the insect tide together. As a time traveler, he was shocked when he saw that those who were despised were actually famous ancient magic weapons. [Fuxi Qin], [Demon Refining Pot], [Shennong Ding], [Kunlun Mirror], [Nuwa Stone].

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!

altTitles.ja: 「筋トレ」

altTitles.th: บริษัทจัดหาผู้กล้า สำหรับส่งไปต่างโลก

description.en:
A parody manga about Isekai and how the heroes are transported to different worlds with the help of Truck-kun's Support Staff.  
Read it left to right.

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

altTitles.vi: Hijiri-kun Chỉ Muốn Sống Thanh Liêm

description.en: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

altTitles.ja: かわいそうな妹ちゃん

description.en: Poor little sister who loves her onii-chan
description.vi: Cô em gái đáng thương phải lòng anh trai mình

altTitles.ja: 彼のいる生活

description.en: Natsukawa Ryouta, a boy with a domestic disposition, is striving to make his college debut. At last, his dream of living alone has come true! Or so he'd thought, but it turns out he has to room with his childhood friend, Tanaka Kazuhito, a guy with a sparkling aura?!

title.en: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!

altTitles.zh: 身为恶役女配的我养成病娇女主很正常吧？！

altTitles.pt-br: Como A Vilã, Criar Uma Protagonista Yandere É Normal, Não É?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Shen Wei E Yi Nv Pei De Wo Yang Cheng Bìng Jiao Nv Zhu Hen Zheng Chang Ba?!

description.en:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
description.zh: 姜央是一名为了游戏新作采风不幸摔下悬崖穿越到修真世界的游戏主美，为了回到原本的世界，姜央努力修炼，终于要飞升成神回到原本的世界，结果因为一条神秘的因果线，被强制牵引到了一个魔法世界中（还是个乙女游戏，游戏刚开始），捡到了初入魔法校园就被恶役女二欺负的的游戏女主。 姜央这时反应过来，这不就是当初让自己穿越的那个倒霉换皮游戏吗？而自己的因果线就连接在了游戏女主星露的身上。姜央以为只要跟着游戏通关，自己就能回到最初的现实世界，但是随着游戏发展，姜央再次回想起了煞笔策划写的沙雕剧情，看着星露受苦，具有强烈责任心和道德感的姜央选择对星露出手相助，不仅要帮对方清理花心皇子那些烂桃花，还传授修真技巧以防对方被其他学生霸凌，甚至有时还得搭上自己的身子！！随着姜央和星露的交往越来越密切，姜央发现自己在星露身上的因果线没有自己想象中那么简单……
description.pt-br:
Jiang Yang é a diretora de designe de arte de um jogo, ao coletar referências para uma nova produção, cai de um penhasco e acaba atravessando para um mundo de cultivo. Para voltar ao seu mundo original, Jiang Yang se dedica ao cultivo e finalmente está prestes a ascender como uma divindade para retornar. No entanto, devido a uma misteriosa linha do destino, ela é forçada a ser puxada para um mundo de magia (que também é um jogo otome, e o jogo acabou de começar). Nesse novo mundo, ela encontra a protagonista do jogo, Xing Lu, sendo intimidada pela vilã secundária logo no início da academia de magia.

Jiang Yang percebe que este é o jogo problemático que a fez atravessar os mundos originalmente. Sua linha do destino está ligada a Xing Lu, a protagonista do jogo. Jiang Yang acredita que, seguindo a história do jogo até o fim, ela poderá retornar ao seu mundo real. No entanto, conforme o jogo se desenvolve, Jiang Yang relembra as tramas ridículas escritas pelo roteirista idiota do jogo. Vendo o sofrimento de Xing Lu, a fortemente responsável e moralmente íntegra Jiang Yang decide ajudar Xing Lu. Ela não apenas ajuda a livrar Xing Lu dos pretendentes indesejados, incluindo o príncipe mulherengo, mas também lhe ensina técnicas de cultivo para que ela possa se defender dos outros estudantes. Às vezes, isso até envolve sacrificar-se fisicamente! 

À medida que Jiang Yang e Xing Lu se tornam mais próximas, Jiang Yang descobre que sua linha do destino com Xing Lu é mais complexa do que ela imaginava...

altTitles.ja: ちっちゃい彼女先輩と同棲します。

altTitles.en: Living Together With My Short Girlfriend Senpai

altTitles.ru: Живу вместе со своей маленькой девушкой семпай

title.en: Yearning for a Night Full of You

altTitles.ja: 君めく夜に焦がれて

description.en: Saint Ruri Girl's Academy. At this academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night... A sweet and fleeting love story between two people who are only allowed to meet at night.

altTitles.ja: Chitchai Kanojo Senpai ga Kawai Sugiru.

altTitles.en: My Little Girlfriend Senpai Is Way Too Cute
My Short Girlfriend Senpai is Way Too Cute

altTitles.ja: ちっちゃい彼女先輩が可愛すぎる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 小不點前輩女友太可愛了。

description.en: Having become an item, Takase and Komai explore the intricacies of a loving relationship, and how they build themselves into stronger people with each other's support.

altTitles.en: My Short Senpai Is Way Too Cute
My Small Senpai Is Way Too Cute

altTitles.ja: ちっちゃい先輩が可愛すぎる。

description.en:
An ordinary run-of-the-mill guy named Takase starts working in the Sales Department of a certain Real Estate agency, and his senpai at this job, Komai, looks more like a middle school girl than an actual adult due to her height and incredible cuteness! As they grow closer together, how will they deal with this unusual situation?  
  
(Not to be confused with *[My Tiny Senpai From Work](https://mangadex.org/title/43610)*, an unrelated work with a similar premise)

altTitles.ja: 着たい服がある

altTitles.en: I show my true colors shining through.
There Are Clothes I Want to Wear

description.en:
University student Mami is seen by everyone as the fashionable cool model-type but she secretly just wants to wear Lolita fashion.  
  
While she tries occasionally to be more cute & less "stylish", she can't overcome the image others have of her. When she watches a new coworker at the cafe she works part-time at leave in a extremely flashy outfit, it sparks the courage in her to express herself more truthfully too!

altTitles.ja: そんな家族なら捨てちゃえば?

altTitles.vi: Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không?

altTitles.en: Is A Family Like This Worth Keeping?
If It's A Family Like That, Why Don't You Throw It Away?

description.en: "My wife made a rule for our home: 'Don't talk to Dad.'" "Isn't that domestic violence? Weren't you sending me an SOS for help?" Reitarou Shinotani has been long ignored by his wife and daughter, left all alone, and forced to do nothing but eat and sleep in a small, dark, cramped room in the house. What fate awaits him, as he aims to revitalize his family...?
description.vi:
Bị vợ và con gái lạnh nhạt, Shinoya Reitaro buộc phải sinh hoạt trong cô độc ngay trong chính căn nhà của mình. 
"Không được bước qua ranh giới, 
Không được ăn uống chung, 
Không được dùng nhà vệ sinh, 
Không được bắt chuyện, 
Không được tạo ra tiếng ồn khi đóng/mở cửa..." 
Cho đến khi anh gặp được một người phụ nữ mà anh không nhớ rõ đã từng gặp qua ở đâu. 
"Một gia đình như vậy có đáng để giữ lại không? Sao anh không vứt quách nó cho rồi đi?" 
Liệu số phận của người đàn ông đang đứng giữa hai sự lựa chọn này rồi sẽ ra sao?

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

altTitles.en: The Mountain Climber and the Sealed Evil Fox

altTitles.ja: 登山者と封印されし悪狐さん

description.en:
A middle-aged man goes to the mountain to commit suicide. On the way he finds a sealed youkai black fox girl in a small cave. She asks him to free her, and he does it without a second thought and goes on to die, but the fox girl, despite her original intentions, forces the man to give up and they eventually marry.  
This is about their married life.
description.fr:
Un homme d’âge moyen se rend dans une montagne pour se suicider. Sur le chemin, il tombe nez à nez avec une démone renard scellée. Elle lui demande de l’aider, ce qu’il fait sans hésiter avant de partir mourir, mais la démone l’arrête et finit, suite à certains événements, par se marier avec lui. Ceci est l’histoire de leur vie de couple.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/doitsuken)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=6455205)
description.pt-br: Um homem de meia idade escala uma montanha para cometer suicídio. No caminho ele encontra uma Raposa Youkai selada em uma pequena caverna. Ela pede para o viajante salvá-la, e ele o faz sem nem pensar duas vezes e retorna em sua caminhada para a morte, porém a Youkai, apesar de suas intenções iniciais, força o homem a desistir e eles eventualmente acabam se casando. Essa história é sobre a sua vinda juntos.

altTitles.th: ลูกไม้หล่นไม่ไกลต้น

description.en: Beautiful and intelligent, Somyung Gil has tirelessly strived to fulfill her mother's vision of the perfect daughter. However, when her less-than-perfect younger brother is tragically found drowned in a river, doubts plague Somyung's heart. She begins to suspect that their mother might be responsible for the unspeakable act. From then on, her paramount goal becomes escaping her mother's grasp, while all her mother wants is for Somyung to experience the perfect life she herself was denied. Will Somyung ever truly find her freedom?

altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

altTitles.th: ฝ่านรกไซต์มรณะ

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女サイト

description.en:
Asagiri Aya is a young girl who has fallen victim to bullies at her school. Looking for a way to escape her troubles, she looks to the internet for distraction, when a mysterious website called “Magical Girl Site” appears. Simply viewing the page is all it takes to hurtle Aya headlong into the deadly world of the Magical Girl Apocalypse. There, it’s fight or die, against a seemingly endless array of savagely adorable, frilly-skirted killing machines, each armed with magical powers and an unquenchable thirst for blood and chaos.

(Source: Seven Seas)
description.pt-br: Asagiri Aya, uma garota intimidado na escola e em casa. Um dia, um site estranho, Mahou Shoujo Site, pisca na tela de seu computador e recebe-la para o Mahou Shoujo Mundial.

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

title.en: Osananajimi no Koukousei no Aida ni Nikutai Kankei wa Seiritsu suru ka.

altTitles.ja: 幼なじみの高校生のあいだに肉体関係は成立するか。

altTitles.es-la: ¿Se puede establecer una relación física entre amigos de la infancia y estudiantes de preparatoria?

altTitles.en: Are Physical Relationships Possible Between Childhood Friends of High School Students?

altTitles.ja-ro: Osananajimi no kōkōsei no aida ni nikutai kankei wa seiritsu suru ka

altTitles.ru: Возможна ли близость между старшеклассниками друзьями детства?

description.en:
An all-new work by Konya Yukio, the author of ‘Only I Know That Hirasaka Hinako Is Erotically Cute.’

The innocent Oota Yuka, the sexually curious Niiyama Kasumi, the elusive Horie Yasuo and the lovesick Onosaka Ryuhei.
The four high school boys and girls, who have grown up like a family, are bequeathed a house by an elderly woman, Hasebe Haru, for four million yen and a fixed term.
Under one roof, the high school students' eccentric love and friendship unfold. A slightly erotic coming-of-age story.
description.es-la:
Del autor de "Hirasaka Hinako es eróticamente linda", un trabajo completamente nuevo de Konya Yunkio.

La inocente Yuka Ota, la sexualmente curiosa Kasumi Niiyama, el evasivo Kosei Horie y el enamoradizo Ryuhei Onosaka. Los cuatro chicos y chicas de preparatoria, que han crecido como una familia, reciben en herencia una casa de una anciana, Hasebe Haru, valorada en cuatro millones de yenes y un plazo fijo. Bajo el mismo techo, se desarrollan el amor y la amistad excéntricos de estudiantes de preparatoria. Una historia juvenil ligeramente erótica.

altTitles.en: I Want to See You Embarrassed

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy. The "exposed love" of twisted adolescence, begins!
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.ja: 冒険王ビィト

description.en:
It's the Century of Darkness where monsters known as Vandels rule the world, and the Vandel Busters are the only ones who can fight them. When a group of Busters are killed in battle, they pass on their magic Saiga weapons to Beet, making him the strongest Buster ever. But Beet won't just fight the Vandels–he wants to destroy them and finally end the Century of Darkness.  
  
**Notes:**  
Returned from a decade-long hiatus in 2016 after the artist was severely injured in 2006.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=4347)  
- [Anime (sequel) on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6209)

altTitles.ja: ガールズゾンビパーティー

description.en: An extreme survival story of girls in a world where half of humanity has turned into monstrous beings!  That day, Sayo Mitsurugi wasn’t focused on her lessons, due to staying up late the previous night.  During the lunch break, she was talking on the phone with her hospitalized younger brother, and up until that moment, everything was part of her usual routine.  But then. Suddenly, the signal cut off, and the phone call ended. From that moment on, hell began!  Due to the influence of zombies that appeared in the school, the men began to transform into monstrous beings one after another.  By chance, Saya teams up with her classmates, the angelic Maria and Momo, to attempt an escape from this hell!
description.ja:
御剣サヤはその日、夜更かしの影響もあって、授業に身が入っていなかった。昼休み、入院中の弟と電話するなど、その時はまでは、変わらない日常だった。

だが。突然電波が途絶えて、電話が切れた。その瞬間から、地獄が始まった！

校内にやってきたゾンビの影響か次々と男たちが異形に変わる。

成り行き、クラスメイトの天使マリアと百城モモとチームを組んで、この地獄からの脱出を図る！

description.en: In a land where there is no magic, a land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey, a land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Xiao Yan, who has shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything three years ago - his powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancée suddenly shown up?
